title: Drawing, Philactetes Applies the Torch of Hercules to the Funeral Pyre, 1780–1800
title_raw: Philactetes Applies the Torch of Hercules to the Funeral Pyre
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on light blue laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: filottete accende la pira ad ercole
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Philactetes shown at left in foreground, bow and quiver lie at right. Hercules still living lies upon burning pile.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Philactetes Applies the Torch of Hercules to the Funeral Pyre, 1780–1800. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on light blue laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3235.
